entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kootenay (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:38 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yoho National Park 07:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -17.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -20.3°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
